content.answer: Our Mediator was called Jesus, because he saveth his people from their sins.

content.question: Why was our Mediator called Jesus?

content_with_prooftexts.answer: Our Mediator was called Jesus, because he saveth his people from their sins.1
content_with_prooftexts.name: Larger Catechism

prooftexts.1:
Matthew 1:21

She will bear a son, and you shall call his name Jesus, for he will save his people from their sins.” (ESV)

content_with_prooftexts.question: Why was our Mediator called Jesus?

feed:
Larger Catechism

Q 41. Why was our Mediator called Jesus?

A. Our Mediator was called Jesus, because he saveth his people from their sins.1

  1. Matthew 1:21

    She will bear a son, and you shall call his name Jesus, for he will save his people from their sins.” (ESV)
title: Why was our mediator called Jesus?
